query:
UPDATE jobs SET paymentAmount = CASE 
  WHEN title LIKE '%Logo%' THEN '0.5'
  WHEN title LIKE '%Landing Page%' THEN '0.4'
  WHEN title LIKE '%Smart Contract%' THEN '0.45'
  WHEN title LIKE '%Social Media%' THEN '0.3'
  WHEN title LIKE '%Documentation%' THEN '0.25'
  ELSE '0.3'
END WHERE status = 'active'
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3Xn2kSFWnC4UnZ2.root --database M4q9hz5cUi4PjsyMSpDUye --execute UPDATE jobs SET paymentAmount = CASE 
  WHEN title LIKE '%Logo%' THEN '0.5'
  WHEN title LIKE '%Landing Page%' THEN '0.4'
  WHEN title LIKE '%Smart Contract%' THEN '0.45'
  WHEN title LIKE '%Social Media%' THEN '0.3'
  WHEN title LIKE '%Documentation%' THEN '0.25'
  ELSE '0.3'
END WHERE status = 'active'
